code: import React from'react';import{useState}from'react';import{Link,useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Chat=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[messages,setMessages]=useState([]);const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const sendMessage=()=>{setMessages([...messages,{text:message,sender:'user'}]);setMessage('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Chats",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"back",to:"/product/".concat(id),children:"BACK"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cws",children:"Chat with Seller"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chats",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"messages",children:messages.map((msg,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"message",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"msg",children:msg.text})},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"typing",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"messageArea",value:message,onChange:e=>setMessage(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"send",onClick:sendMessage,children:"SEND"})]})]})]});};export default Chat;
